column4: If I want to open my Downloads folder on my desktop what is the proper command
why command?  Just go to Places -> Home  and then your downloads folder.  Or: what do you actually want to do?
erm, why do you want an antivirus?
well first off, the antivirus that you run on linux are usually for finding windows viruses (for mail servers for example) and second, you aren't running windows, stop worrying about silly things
